name: 劉建浩
objective: 本課程目標為幫助學生建立問題解決之能力。課程將首先介紹目前用於解決多目標決策問題的一些數量方法，之後說明各種多目標決策方法及其適用的問題類型。上課方式主要透過講解、問答、作業、報告及考試的方式提升學生學習的效果。課程主要介紹的方法有如下AHP, ANP, TOPSIS, VIKOR, DEMATEL, Gray Relation Methods, Fuzzy Integral, Fuzzy Set Theory, Rough Set Theory, Compromised Solutions及 De Novo。經由此課程的學習，學生於期末時應該可以培養各種解決多目標決策問題的技能。
schedule:
1.　　多目標決策分析簡介(1週)
Introduction to multiple criteria decision making (week 2)
2.　　層級分析法(AHP)簡介 (2週)
Analytical Hierarchy Process (week 1)
3.　　模糊理論與模糊數簡介 (3-4週)
Fuzzy theory and fuzzy number (weeks 3-4)
4.　　模糊層級分析法(5週)
Fuzzy AHP (week 5)
5.　　模糊積分法之應用(6週
Fuzzy integral and its applications (week 6)
6.　　網路分析程序(ANP) (7週) 
Analytic network process (week 7)
7.　　TOPSIS方法(8週)
TOPSIS method (week 8)
8.　　期中報告 (9週)
Midterm report (week 9)
9.　　灰關聯理論 (10週)
Gray relation theory (week 10)
10.　　VIKOR方法 (11週)
VIKOR method (week 11)
11.　　DEMATEL方法 (12週)
DEMATEL method (week 12)
12.　　約略集合簡介及應用(13-14週) 
Rough set theory and its applications (weeks 13-14)
13.　　多目標妥協解 (15週)
Compromised solution (week 15)
14.　　DEA分析 (16-17週)
DEA analysis (weeks 16-17)
15.　　期末測驗 (18週)
Final examination (week 18)
materials:
Textbook: Class handouts and reference paper
Multiple Attribute Decision Making Methods and Applications
(G.H. Tzeng and J.J. Huang, CRC Press, Taylor & Francis Group, 2011)
